segments.text: Maybe we all will be all things to all men .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But for the life , we'll be changed by this society .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really don't want to go into the world , I feel afraid of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be silly . We have reached the age to take the responsibility by ourselves .
segments.speaker: S1
